SNG.LS.summary: Sonagi, S.G.P.S., S.A. operates in the real estate sector in Portugal. Its portfolio includes industrial/logistics, office, residential, and retail properties. The company was formerly known as SONAGI-Sociedade Nacional de GestÃ£o e Investimento, S.A. and changed its name to Sonagi, S.G.P.S., S.A. in September 2003. Sonagi, S.G.P.S., S.A. was founded in 1868 and is based in Lisbon, Portugal.
